name: The Explosive Ship
description:
In this colorful game you will drive a ship, you can speed up and shoot, theres a percentage, it means the probability of a good shoot, if your shoot goes wrong the ship will be destroyed, you can recover the percentage by catching points. You win if you get 11 points, on endless mode there's no points limit. If an enemy touch you, your game get restarted

Caracteristics

  • Dinamic Music
  • Normal Mode
  • Endless Mode

Im working on port the game to:

  • Android
